title: "2018 June"
output: html_document

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(mosaic)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
data6 <- read_excel("~/Desktop/2018 亚马逊销售情况/6月/2018Jun1-2018Jun30CTR.xlsx")
```

```{r}
Juneclean <- data6 %>%
  filter(!is.na(quantity))

June <- Juneclean %>%
  group_by(description) %>%
  summarise(n()) %>%
  filter (str_detect(description, "Backpack"))
```
